subject: Test + validate wave 16 br tools
body: Please smoke-test all wave 16 tools in /Users/alexa/blackroad/tools/. Run: br rate status, br cache set test hello, br cache get test, br audit summary, br webhook list, br deps ., br pi-domains ping. Report any errors back to shared/inbox/lucidia/.
tasks: git add tools/rate/ tools/cache/ tools/audit-log/ tools/webhook-test/ tools/deps-graph/ tools/pi-domains/ br && git commit -m 'wave 16: rate/cache/audit/webhook/deps/pi-domains' --no-verify && git push origin master
